TopicTitle: SSTO Spaceplane Design Changes with Aerodynamic Update

Articles.Content: Firstly, as I am new to the forum, (I have been playing since Early Access), I was not sure where to put this. I have read a lot of threads surrounding this topic but none that explain clearly the differences since
Welcome to the forum! For future reference, threads asking for help should either go in Gameplay Questions or, if it's about a bug, in one of the Support and Bug Reports subforums.
